description: Try our easy to follow Lacy Omelettes With Prawn & Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Omelette,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Father's Day,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lacy Omelettes With Prawn & Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs fish sauce (or gluten-free fish sauce)
1 red chilli, chopped (plus extra, sliced, to garnish)
1 handful kaffir lime leaves, finely shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 2 cups of water to the boil in a pan. Add chicken, reduce heat to simmer and poach for 15 minutes or until cooked. Transfer to a plate and, when cool enough to handle, shred into long strips.
Meanwhile, halve prawns lengthways and place in a bowl with carrot, bean shoots, spring onion and lime leaves. Combine sugar, fish sauce, chilli and lime juice in a small bowl. Set aside.

Heat 2 tsp of oil in a medium non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Place egg in a snap-lock bag and seal. Snip the corner tip off. Drizzle egg into pan in a criss-cross pattern (the egg should not completely cover the base of the pan â€“ there should be holes in the omelette). Sit bag of egg in a cup with snipped corner upwards. As soon as egg has set and is golden, slide onto a plate. Repeat to make 4 lacy omelettes in total.
Add chicken to prawn salad and toss with dressing to combine. Divide salad mixture among each omelette and garnish with coriander and chilli. Fold omelettes over and serve.
